--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "lildoc_2k4" <jdholland@e...> wrote:
> Does anyone still have the full version? I have the demo and its a 
> really cool game. I just want to ge a download of the full thing.

Yes, I have the full game without any password protection, but... 
that really wouldn't be fair of me to give it to you! Think of all 
the hard work the guys who made Gladiator had to go through! Surely 
you could spare $10 to get the full version.
